author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.
notes: Imprint from Wing; foot of page 8, above "Finis", reads: Printed according to order.
A reply to "An antidote against foure dangerous quæries" (Wing A3493), which was a reply to Prynne's "Foure serious questions of grand importance" (Wing P3959).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Chuch of England --  Discipline --  Early works to 1800.
